 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּקְבֻּק‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==flask== (from gurgling sound of emptyIng, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhMQAYAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAxABgAAAJ6hI+py+0PT5ghKlrtqlMjnDGhEZYjxJ0JRrJA9zbqC14uZcMfvvHr5anJPMSZjbZKRZREB7MJjUqTPWPut1QJH65W9hjjZk66ahkZ/lDTXlHnvJXktLJxufbuCu11fArEAvgXd0WiZti34zPF2OhkBeS4hnImGWRpWQAAOw=="> ***gurgling sound***; also Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***cantharus***, etc.) — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּקְבֻּק‎</span> [[Jer.19.10|Jer 19:10]] construct ***id.*** [[1Kgs.14.3|1Kgs 14:3]]; [[Jer.19.1|Jer 19:1]].
